mapper.update: update c_data_authority set object_table = #{dataAuthority.objectTable}, object_id = #{dataAuthority.objectId}, owner_level = #{dataAuthority.ownerLevel}, owner_id = #{dataAuthority.ownerId}, create_time = #{dataAuthority.createTime}, update_time = #{dataAuthority.updateTime}, operator = #{dataAuthority.operator}, type = #{dataAuthority.type}, iscancel = #{dataAuthority.iscancel}, remark = #{dataAuthority.remark} where id = #{id}
